osvSchema.details:
Insufficient DRAM address validation in System
Management Unit (SMU) may allow an attacker to read/write from/to an invalid
DRAM address, potentially resulting in denial-of-service.

product_data.product_name: AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ 3000 Series Processors “Castle Peak” HEDT
AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ PRO Processors “Castle Peak” WS SP3
AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ PRO 3000WX Series Processors  “Chagall” WS

description_data.value:
Insufficient DRAM address validation in System
Management Unit (SMU) may allow an attacker to read/write from/to an invalid
DRAM address, potentially resulting in denial-of-service.

descriptions.value:
Insufficient DRAM address validation in System
Management Unit (SMU) may allow an attacker to read/write from/to an invalid
DRAM address, potentially resulting in denial-of-service.

Una validación de dirección DRAM insuficiente en System Management Unit (SMU) puede permitir que un atacante lea/escriba desde/hacia una dirección DRAM no válida, lo que podría provocar una denegación de servicio.
